channel.title: [PI] galkons client ? changing client background?
channel.description:
Hello,
Im trying to change the client background behind the loading bar on this client, but i cant find where i change or what i change can some1 help me?

item.title: [PI] galkons client ? changing client background?
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

Vince:

Load both from cache… Use Tom’s cache suite

where do i change what image they load or where they load from, because their are crowns but no crown pictures in the cache sprites.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] galkons client ? changing client background?

@Vince2 wrote:

item.title: [PI] galkons client ? changing client background?
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:4, topic:373424”]Change the crown sprites in your cache.

And as for the background, I’m pretty sure all Galkon clients need a mirrored image. So you have to take a normal image, cut it vertically down the middle, and reflect the right half across a vertical axis. So flip it.[/quote]
i know this but there is no crowns in sprites…as was the same with background

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] galkons client ? changing client background?
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

Change the crown sprites in your cache.

And as for the background, I’m pretty sure all Galkon clients need a mirrored image. So you have to take a normal image, cut it vertically down the middle, and reflect the right half across a vertical axis. So flip it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] galkons client ? changing client background?
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

Thanks alot This helped although it cuts it in half and shuffles it but that i can fix myself,

also would you have any idea where i would find the crowns for staff? in the cache or client files i want to change them

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] galkons client ? changing client background?
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

I’m pretty sure this is how it works for Galkons.

Open up your Sprites class and search for

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(abyte0);

Comment that line out and replace it with

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(location+"Background.png");

Change “background.png” to whatever image your using is called.

Read full topic
